activities.name: Site selection/Construction of appropriate housing and source for market
Preparation before arrival of day-old chicks
1st Gumboro vaccine intermediate administration if day-old chicks were not given Gumboro matelin at hatchery.
1st Newcastle HB1 (Hitchner) vaccine administration through water
2nd Gumboro vaccine Intermediate plus administration through water
Debeaking for white birds* and brown birds
Biosecurity measures/ husbandry practices observed throughout

headers: CUSTOMISED LAYER PRODUCTION CALENDAR FOR CENTRAL AND WESTERN REGIONS
